HttpServer - Class in acsse.csc2b
A basic HTTP server that listens on a specified port and handles client connections.

Default Constructor

R

run() - Method in class acsse.csc2b.ClientHandler
Processes the client request, serves the requested file, or sends an appropriate HTTP error response if the file is not found or if an error occurs.

S

startServer() - Method in class acsse.csc2b.HttpServer
Starts the server, accepting client connections and handling them in separate threads.
